Name: Oneness
About the game: Oneness is a simple puzzle game with simple but challenge rules, you need use only one line to join all the squares together, when you need to match the condition to achieve award . In this game you can reward awards and cards. This is only for Steam system. [Characteristic] Over 100 challenges, harder and harder in each stage Endless mode for advanced player Minimalism Ul, and friendly action Award system to show others your skill
